forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms during the morning followed by occasional showers this afternoon. High around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High near 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers during the evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 38F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 54F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
